text: Umo vachachema: “Tenzi wedu! Tiburitseiwo, tichaita mabasa akanaka kwete ayo ataiita.” (Allah vachapindura vachiti): “Hatina here kukupai hupenyu hwakakwana, kuitira kuti uyo anenge atambira chenjedzo obva aitambira? Uye muyambiri akauya kwamuri. Saka ravirai (huipi hwemabasa enyu). Kune vaiti vezvakashata hapana mubatsiri.”
